description: Episode of Series "History of the Motion Picture". This is a shortened version with music and commentary of Cecil B. De Mille's elaborate 1925 romantic drama on the theme of reincarnation. An estranged couple are involved in a disastrous train crash and revert to their former lives in the Middle Ages. The train wreck was a remarkable piece of staging, placing the lives of the leading actors at risk.
